entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
